Package banking.application.controller

Class BankAccountController

java.lang.Object
banking.application.controller.Controller
banking.application.controller.BankAccountController
@SpringBootApplication @RequestMapping("/account") public class BankAccountController extends Controller
Controller handling users banking accounts

  • Method Details

    • OpenAccount

      @PostMapping("open/{accountType}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<?> OpenAccount(@PathVariable AccountType accountType)
      Open account for JWT's owner. Disallows creating same type accounts.
      Parameters:
      accountType - which account to open
      Returns:
      Account's iban or error

    • TransferMoney

      @PostMapping("transfer/{accountType}") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity TransferMoney(@PathVariable AccountType accountType, @Valid @RequestBody @Valid TransferInput transferInput)
      Transfer money from user's chosen account to another account
      Parameters:
      accountType - type of account to send from
      Returns:
      balance after transfer if success else error

    • BankAccountInfo

      Parameters:
      accountType - type of account to get info of
      Returns:
      requested bank account information
